name: Personal Portfolio Template
description:
Hello There 😍


✅ Here's the idea for the Figma Portfolio Template is a unique and creative design with amazing colors and clean typography.


✅ It comes with a flexible & easy structure which will help designers to get started quickly. It also includes a well-documented file for usage. All symbols and objects are vector-based and easily editable.


✅ The source files are fully editable and well organized, it’s very easy to customize and tailor to your needs.


✅ Figma Portfolio Website Template is simple, easy to mix, and every single page is styled for the best user experience & growth conversion.


✅ This file includes symbols and layer styles, so that you will easily be able to change the entire UI Kit’s colors, icons, typography, and some components in just a few clicks! 


✅ Hope you enjoy it! Thanks for your likes ❤️ and comments!


✅ Have an amazing project?
